WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT A.CODE, B.NAME, D.MEM_CODE || ' - ' || D.NAME MEM_CODE, D.MEM_ID,C.CT_SUB_GRP, C.LAST_GRP_CODE, D.MEM_CODE MEMCODE FROM SYS0005M A INNER JOIN ORG0001D B ON B.BRNCH = A.BRNCH_ID INNER JOIN ORG0005D C ON C.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND C.MEM_LVL IN ('3', '4') INNER JOIN ORG0001D D ON D.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID AND D.STUS = '1' WHERE A.TYPE_ID = '43' ), TEMP2 AS ( SELECT * FROM SVC0054M WHERE MAJOR_GRP = 1 ) SELECT T1.CODE, T1.NAME, T1.MEM_CODE, T1.MEM_ID, T2.CT_SUB_GRP, T1.LAST_GRP_CODE FROM TEMP T1, TEMP2 T2 WHERE T1.MEM_ID = T2.MEM_ID(+)
AND LOWER(T1.CODE) = LOWER(#{dscCode})
AND LOWER(T1.MEM_CODE) = LOWER(#{memCode})
AND LOWER(T1.MEM_CODE) = LOWER(#{CTMemId})
AND LOWER(T2.CT_SUB_GRP) = LOWER(#{ctSubGrp})
ORDER BY T1.CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE ORG0019M SET PRIOD_FROM =TO_DATE(#{priodFrom},'YYYY/MM/DD'), PRIOD_TO = TO_DATE(#{priodTo},'YYYY/MM/DD'), LOC_TYPE = #{locType}, SVC_WEEK = #{serviceWeek}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE AREA_ID = #{areaId} AND BRNCH_TYPE = 43 AND AVAIL_FLAG = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT CT_SUB_GRP CODE_ID, CT_SUB_GRP CODE_NAME FROM SYS0064M WHERE CT_BRNCH_CODE = #{branchCode} and CT_SUB_GRP is not null ORDER BY CT_SUB_GRP ASC
